alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Clay; Clinton; Jackson; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 12:42AM CDT until July 05 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clinton County in northwestern Missouri... Clay County in west central Missouri... Western Ray County in west central Missouri... Western Caldwell County in north central Missouri... Northern Jackson County in west central Missouri... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1241 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stewartsville to near Parkville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Independence, Liberty, Gladstone, Excelsior Springs, Cameron, Smithville, Kearney, North Kansas City, Sugar Creek, Buckner, Lawson, Plattsburg, Lathrop, Claycomo, Courtney, Pleasant Valley, Orrick, Trimble and Polo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri near mile marker 2. Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 3 and 53. Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 435 between mile markers 40 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
